set.name: ORC
set.longname: An Oddness in the River Cities

card.name: Framed Collection
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Framed Collection enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Learned Rabota
card.text: Reach {2}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Haunted Widower
card.text: Haunted Widower enters with a 1/1 blue Spirit creature counter with flying on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Skybound Constable
card.text: Flying When Skybound Constable enters, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Lorre Patsy
card.text: Lorre Patsy enters with a 3/3 black Warrior creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Whenever Lorre Patsy and at least two other creatures attack, Lorre Patsy gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gutbucket Gang
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a 1/1 red Rogue creature counter on Gutbucket Gang. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Mabuse Recruiter
card.text: Mabuse Recruiter enters with two 1/1 red Rogue creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Hero of the Force
card.text: Flying Whenever three or more creatures you control aren't blocked, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Hound of the Bureau
card.text: Vigilance When Hound of the Bureau enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Purifier of Division
card.text: Lifelink, prowess

card.name: Asset Protection Manager
card.text: Betrayal {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) When Asset Protection Manager enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Asset Protection Manager leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Wrapped in Quiet Lies
card.text: Choose one — • Tap up to two target creatures. • Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. You gain 2 life. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Stunning Irruption
card.text: Stunning Irruption deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Marked for Grace
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When Marked for Grace enters, untap enchanted creature and it gains hexproof until end of turn. Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: Lift Archaic Wards
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield. (This causes creature counters to become creature tokens.)

card.name: Sleep in Company
card.text: Remove all counters from target nonland permanent, then exile it.

card.name: Sinister Thought-Snatcher
card.text: Flying When Sinister Thought-Snatcher enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Deepsea Detective
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Choose any number of target players. If you chose an opponent, surveil 1. Each chosen player draws a card, then discards a card.

card.name: Papertrail Trickster
card.text: Papertrail Trickster gets +1/+0 as long as it is unblocked. (This only happens after blockers have been declared and it is attacking.) Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Drift of the Departed
card.text: Create two 1/1 blue Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Sleuth of the Deep Hours
card.text: Betrayal {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Whenever Sleuth of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, draw a card.

card.name: Squeak-ret Operative
card.text: Prowess Whenever Squeak-ret Operative deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Brute of the Velvet Rope
card.text: Betrayal {3}{U} ({3}{U}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) When Brute of the Velvet Rope enters, return target creature to its owner's hand. If Brute of the Velvet Rope betrayed a creature, instead you may have that creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Stool Pidgeon
card.text: Flash Flying When Stool Pidgeon enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Skyline Snooper
card.text: Flying, ward {2} Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Missing Piece of Reality
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. {1}{U}, Exile Missing Piece of Reality from your graveyard: Surveil 2, then investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Spill the Beans
card.text: Draw a card. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Proboscidian Transmutation
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1, has flying, loses all other abilities, and is an Insect Mutant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Refuse the Ruse
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Return target creature with mana value 2 or less to its owner's hand.

card.name: Woke Up Wrong
card.text: Exile target artifact or creature you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step with a 4/4 green Horror creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Defensive Stratagem
card.text: Surveil 2, then draw two cards.

card.name: Mockery of Flesh
card.text: Deathtouch When Mockery of Flesh dies, mill a card and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lorre Blackmailer
card.text: When Lorre Blackmailer enters, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Woman with a Past
card.text: Flash Woman with a Past enters with a 2/2 white Soldier creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Arrogant Moroii
card.text: When Arrogant Moroii enters, remove two counters from target permanent. (Creature counters removed this way won't become tokens.)

card.name: Truthsniffer
card.text: When Truthsniffer enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it and that player discards that card. If no cards were discarded this way, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Lorre Bagman
card.text: Betrayal {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Whenever Medium Creature deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Unweaving Raven
card.text: Flying Unweaving Raven gets +1/+0 and has menace as long as you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

card.name: Whisperer to the Chthonic
card.text: Betrayal {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Whenever Whisperer to the Chthonic deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Perimeter Lookout
card.text: Perimeter Lookout enters with two 2/2 white Soldier creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) Lifelink Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Stage the Grift
card.text: Put a 3/3 black Warrior creature counter on target creature you control. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Flashback {4}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Thread of Obsession
card.text: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Perseverance
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchant creature gets +1/+0 and has lifelink. When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

card.name: A Step Too Late
card.text: Choose one — • Target opponent sacrifices a creature. • Target opponent sacrifices an enchantment. • Target opponent sacrifices a battle.

card.name: Become Ashes
card.text: Remove all counters from target creature. It gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If it would die this turn, exile it instead. (Creature counters removed this way don't become creature tokens.)

card.name: Searing Redemption
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target creature. You gain 3 life. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Veiled Scapegoat
card.text: Prowess When Veiled Scapegoat dies, if its power was 2 or greater, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Pawn of Plenty
card.text: Menace Whenever Pawn of Plenty deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Moroii Initiate
card.text: Once each turn, whenever you sacrifice a non-Treasure permanent, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Precinct Director
card.text: Betrayal {R} ({R}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) When Precinct Director enters, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Veda's Ears
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control enters, Veda's Ears deals 1 damage to target battle, player, or planeswalker. {T}: Target creature you control with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Star of the Gala
card.text: Star of the Gala enters with two 1/1 red Rogue creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) Prowess, haste

card.name: Fox Agency Infiltrator
card.text: Haste Whenever Fox Agency Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Ill-Mannered Aberration
card.text: When Ill-Mannered Aberration enters, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Chum Collector
card.text: Betrayal {4}{R} ({4}{R}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Trample When Chum Collector enters, you may have it deal 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Famished Moroii
card.text: Reach At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Famished Moroii deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Wrap Up
card.text: This spell can't be countered. (Hexproof still stops it.) Wrap Up deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Confession by Gunfire
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Put a 2/2 white Soldier creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Affair by Candlelight
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Blood Fugue
card.text: Choose one — • Blood Fugue deals 4 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Boiler Ambush
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature or pay {2}. Boiler Ambush deals 6 damage to any nonplayer target.

card.name: Dustridden Smuggler
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, mill a card. As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Dustridden Smuggler gets +2/+2, has trample, and is a Horror.

card.name: Inspector of the Wilds
card.text: When Inspector of the Wilds enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Furline Smuggler
card.text: Betrayal {G} ({G}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) When Furline Smuggler enters, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Unwitting Devotee
card.text: Unwitting Devotee enters with a 4/4 green Horror creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) When Unwitting Devotee enters, mill three cards.

card.name: Unknowing Devotee
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Unknowing Devotee attacks while there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Lawbound Tracker
card.text: Vigilance When Lawbound Tracker enters, for each kind of counter on target permanent, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.

card.name: Red-Lipped Dame
card.text: Red-Lipped Dame enters with two 1/1 red Rogue creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) When Red-Lipped Dame enters, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Catscratch Bouncer
card.text: Betrayal {3}{G} ({3}{G}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Whenever Catscratch Bouncer deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, create a 1/1 red Rogue creature token.

card.name: Innocent Stray
card.text: Trample When Innocent Stray enters, you gain 3 life. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Coopmaster
card.text: Coopmaster enters with a 4/4 green Horror creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Reach {2}{G}, Remove a counter from Coopmaster: It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Tampered Instincts
card.text: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among the cards milled this way into your hand.

card.name: Prizefight
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Weighted Farewell
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. The next nonmana ability you activate this turn costs {2}{G} (or {3}) less to activate.

card.name: Dust Overload
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Sunset on the Cawyer
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Outlands Sifter
card.text: When Outlands Sifter enters, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Pilfered Jewels
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, Sacrifice Pilfered Jewels: Draw a card.

card.name: Fusebreaker
Whispered Refuge
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Whispered Refuge: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. {T}, Sacrifice Whispered Refuge: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Entry to Preservation
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) As Entry to Preservation enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Preservation enters tapped.

card.name: Entry to Divergence
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) As Entry to Divergence enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Divergence enters tapped.

card.name: Entry to Ambition
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Entry to Ambition enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Ambition enters tapped.

card.name: Entry to Indulgence
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Entry to Indulgence enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Indulgence enters tapped.

card.name: Entry to Ruin
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Entry to Ruin enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Ruin enters tapped.

card.name: Thief of the Masked Benefactor
card.text: Prowess Whenever Thief of the Masked Benefactor attacks a battle or planeswalker, it gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: District Nine Runner
card.text: Whenever District Nine Runner attacks, target attacking Soldier gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Exile three cards from your graveyard: District Nine Runner gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Gold-Tongued Broker
card.text: Whenever you gain life, create a 1/1 red Rogue creature token if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, surveil 1. If it's the third time, return a creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Guardian of the Badge
card.text: Whenever Guardian of the Badge attacks, up to two other attacking creatures with lesser power gain indestructible until end of turn. When this creature dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Everyone's Acquaintance
card.text: When Everyone's Acquaintance enters, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Put a creature counter that's a copy of that creature on Everyone's Acquaintance. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Faith-Eaten Penitent
card.text: Whenever Faith-Eaten Penitent or another creature you control enters or a counter becomes a creature you control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained 5 or more life this turn, Faith-Eaten Penitent becomes a 6/6 Horror creature and lose all abilities. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)

card.name: Drift of Griffins
card.text: Flying, vigilance {2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Candle for Those Gone
card.text: When Candle for Those Gone enters, put a 1/1 blue Spirit creature counter with flying on each other creature you control. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Whenever a creature you control dies, if it didn't have counters on it, put a 1/1 blue Spirit creature counter with flying on Candle for Those Gone.

card.name: Rekindled Purpose
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. Whenever a creature token you control dies, put a loyalty counter on an Aryeh planeswalker you control.

card.name: Herald of Unity
card.text: Betrayal {4}{W} ({4}{W}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Flying When Herald of Unity enters, if it didn't enter from exile, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Containment Sigil
card.text: Flash When Containment Sigil enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Containment Sigil leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Glimmer of the Chase
card.text: Exile target creature. It's controller puts a creature counter that's a copy of that creature on target nonland permanent they control. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Vanishing Act
card.text: Exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Case in Motion
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {2}, Sacrifice a Clue: Create a 2/2 white Soldier creature token. It can't block this turn.

card.name: Quiet Audit
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control and each counter on permanents you control. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Terms of Salvation
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Terms of Salvation enters or is defeated, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: A Forged Familicide
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When A Forged Familicide enters or is defeated, exile up to two cards from graveyard, then create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Voicewoven Heretic
card.text: Prowess Whenever Voicewoven Heretic deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Pipeway Inspector
card.text: Flash When Pipeway Inspector enters, counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of Detectives you control plus the number of Clues you control.

card.name: Muckraker Seeker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Clue: Draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creatures dealt combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent this turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Melodic Mole
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast your first spell during an opponent's turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Master of Quiet Crimes
card.text: Whenever you attack, choose any number. Each must choose a different target. • Target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. • Target attacking creature gains flying and gets +1/+0 until end of turn. • Untap target attacking creature.

card.name: Invasion of the Thought-Snatchers
card.text: When Invasion of the Thought-Snatchers enters, create two 1/1 blue Insect Horror creature tokens with flying, then draw a card. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on each Insect you control. • Create a 1/1 blue Insect Horror creature token with flying.

card.name: Hardline Enforcer
card.text: Flash Betrayal {U} ({U}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) When Hardline Enforcer enters, target creature phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Mabuse Mastermind
card.text: Ward {2} Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent or noncreature permanent, draw a card.

card.name: Hull-Cracker Kraken
card.text: Flash Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.) When Hull-Cracker Kraken enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Reconstruct The Scene
card.text: Investigate, then sacrifice any number of Clues. Surveil 3, then draw a card for each Clue sacrificed this way. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Still the Pandemonium
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Inheritance of Thought
card.text: Put a creature counter on target creature you control that's a copy of that creature. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Strange Disappearance
card.text: Choose one — • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Return up to three target tokens to their owner's hands.

card.name: Formally Missing
card.text: Flash Enchant creature or Clue Enchanted permanent is a colorless Clue artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card" and loses all other abilities. (It's no longer a creature or planeswalker.)

card.name: Arcane Kenning
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact, instant, or sorcery card with mana value equal to X plus the sacrificed artifact's mana value, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. If you control a Tobias planeswalker, copy it.

card.name: Low Tide, High Stakes
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) Flash When Low Tide, High Stakes enters, if you cast it, counter target spell.

card.name: Impressions of Oil and Flesh
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Impressions of Oil and Flesh enters, if you cast it, you may create a token that's a copy of target nonbattle permanent you control.

card.name: Scene Reader
card.text: Whenever Scene Reader or another nonartifact creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Threadbound Remnant
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lurking Abominations
card.text: Menace Lurking Abominations gets +1/+1 for each Swamp you control.

card.name: Threadcloaked Operative
card.text: Betrayal {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Menace Whenever Threadcloaked Operative deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Smooth-Tongued Extractor
card.text: Betrayal {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Whenever Smooth-Tongued Extractor deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, mill three cards, then return a card milled this way to your hand.

card.name: Tethered Killer
card.text: Tethered Killer can't block. When Tethered Killer dies, exile it. If you do, put a creature counter that's a copy of it on target permanent you control. You lose 1 life. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Schedule Maker
card.text: Whenever a Warrior you control deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, create a Treasure token. Sacrifice three artifact tokens: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Harbinger of Grey
card.text: Flying When Harbinger of Grey enters, destroy any number of target creatures with total mana value 4 or less. {1}{B}, Discard Harbinger of Grey: Return up to one target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Unworthy Vessel
card.text: When Large Creature enters, if it was cast or if you control a Ciar planeswalker, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you control a Ciar planeswalker, that creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Deadly Interrogation
card.text: Target opponent reveals all but one card in their hand. You choose a nonland card revealed this way. That player discards that card.

card.name: Nothing Left to Lose
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Buried in Deadlines
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 2 life. {X}{B}{B}, Discard a card: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Spider's Bite
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 3 life unless that permanent's mana value was less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Medium of Madness
card.text: When Medium of Madness enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Behind Every Corner
card.text: For each creature card in your graveyard, put a 1/1 black Shade creature counter on target permanent you control. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: A Wake in Shadows
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When A Wake in Shadows enters, mill three cards, then return a card milled this way to your hand. Whenever A Wake in Shadows is defeated, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: No Clean Way Out
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When No Clean Way Out enters or is defeated, each opponent discards a card. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Clawed Coquette
card.text: Prowess When Clawed Coquette dies, you may return target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard with a mana value less than Clawed Coquette's power to your hand.

card.name: Silkclad Socialite
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a permanent with mana value 4 or greater, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Fangpoint Bargainer
card.text: Haste Whenever Fangpoint Bargainer attacks, put a 1/1 red Rogue creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Remove a counter from Fangpoint Bargainer: Fangpoint Bargainer gains menace and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Furensics Expert
card.text: When Furensics Expert enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Clues you control have "Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn" and lose all other abilities.

card.name: Uniter of Holy Flames
card.text: Betrayal {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Menace Whenever Uniter of Holy Flames deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

card.name: Unleashed Constable
card.text: Trample Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Unleashed Constable. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, Unleashed Constable gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Infernal Middleman
card.text: Haste When Infernal Middleman enters, if you cast it, choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Ravener of the Docks
card.text: Betrayal {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Ravener of the Docks unless you've sacrificed a permanent this turn.

card.name: Mabuse Muscle
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn. Flying

card.name: Surge of the Moment
card.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player or battle this turn, you may have it deal that much damage to another player or battle.

card.name: Masquerade of Means
card.text: Whenever one or more Rogues you control attack, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Spells you cast from exile during your turn cost {X} less to cast, where X is the number of creatures that attacked and weren't blocked this turn.

card.name: Antiquated Shot
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've sacrificed a permanent this turn or you control an Imani planeswalker. Antiquated Shot deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Red Herring
card.text: Choose one — • Red Herring deals 2 damage to each creature and planeswalker. • You may choose new targets for target spell or ability.

card.name: Self Check-Out
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Self Check-Out deals 4 damage any nonplayer target.

card.name: A Toast and a Vow of Union
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile two cards in your graveyard. If you do, create a 3/3 black Warrior creature token with haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

card.name: Framed in Flames
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Framed in Flames enters, it deals 4 damage to any other target. When Framed in Flames is defeated, create a Treasure token.

card.name: The Break at Museum Row
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When The Break at Museum Row enters or is defeated, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until your next end step.

card.name: Chrysalis Unbound
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Whenever an Insect or Horror you control enters or becomes a creature, put a loyalty counter on a Hayat planeswalker you control.

card.name: Oblivious Officer
card.text: Whenever Oblivious Officer attacks while you control three or more tokens, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each other nontoken creature you control enters with an additional 1/1 black Shade creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Shadebound Vessel
card.text: If you would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, those counters plus a 1/1 black Shade creature counter are put on it instead. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Hat in the Husks
card.text: Haste When Hat in the Husks enters, mill three cards. Whenever Hat in the Husks attacks or dies, return a land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Outlands Gatekeeper
card.text: Outlands Gatekeeper can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever Outlands Gatekeeper deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

card.name: Cobblestone Crew
card.text: Cobblestone Crew enters with three 1/1 red Rogue creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.)

card.name: Dust-Hardened Tracker
card.text: When Dust-Hardened Tracker enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Clues you control have "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Faceless Hound
card.text: Trample Whenever Faceless Hound attacks while there are four or more card types among cards types in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature.

card.name: Cradlebreaker Primordial
card.text: Trample When Cradlebreaker Primordial enters, for each kind of counter on other permanents you control, put a counter of that kind on Cradlebreaker Primordial. (This includes creature counters.)

card.name: Writhing Obedience
card.text: Trample Whenever Writhing Obedience enters or attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Wriggling Wound

card.name: Coded Passage
card.text: Mill four cards. When you do, put target land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Indifferent Brawl
card.text: Choose target creature you control. When you do, choose one. card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any nonplayer target. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: The Silence at Verdant Valley
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When The Silence at Verdant Valley enters or is defeated, create a 4/4 green Horror creature token.

card.text: Each player can't draw more than one card each turn. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Entry to Entertainment enters, you may tap another untapped permanent you control. If you don't, Entry to Entertainment enters tapped.

card.text: Return each creature with mana value 3 or less to their owner's hands.

card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card unless they pay 3 life. As long as a player has no cards in hand, Crowded Murmurs is a 5/3 black Horror creature with deathtouch in addition to its other types.

card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Wandering Ember or another creature you control enters, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with lesser mana value. That creature gains "Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a copy of the exiled card." (You still pay the costs.)

card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of Horrors you control. Trample When Maw of Borrowed Flesh enters, you gain 12 life.

card.text: Remove all counters from up to three target permanents. Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each counter removed from permanents you control this way.

card.name: L'appel du vide
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is dealt damage, put a 4/4 green Horror creature counter on it. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Creatures with counters on them attack each combat if able.

card.text: Noncreature counters on permanents you control are also 1/1 green Insect creature counters. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) {2}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Gentle Collector
card.text: When Gentle Collector enters, create a colorless legendary artifact token named Collections Box with "{T}: You gain 1 life." Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Gentle Collector.

card.name: Conjuror Extraordinaire
card.text: When Conjuror Extraordinaire enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control, except it is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "Whenever this creature is the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it." It can't block this turn.

card.name: Cleaner's Hammer
card.text: Menace, lifelink Whenever Cleaner's Hammer or another Warrior you control enters or becomes a creature, each opponent discards a card if it's your turn. If they don't discard a card, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Grafted Sins
card.text: Choose X target creatures. For each creature chosen this way, exile the top card of your library until a creature card is revealed and exile it. card.name: Scourge of Sapience

Midshift Mourner

(This effect lasts indefinitely.) • Target player gains X life.

card.text: Destroy all creatures, then destroy all tokens. (This will destroy creature counters that become tokens.)

card.text: Exile target spell. Its controller may cast it for as long as it remains exiled by discarding a card in addition to its other costs.

card.text: Vigilance Wide-Eyed Inquirer's power is equal to the number of tokens you control.

card.text: Creatures you control entering cause abilities of permanents you control to trigger as though that creature died.

card.name: Echoes of Encouragement

card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target nonland permanent's controller sacrifices it. It's controller gains 2 life.

card.text: First strike Whenever one or more creatures you control are unblocked, untap up to that many target permanents you control.

card.name: Fraying Echoes
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile any number of cards from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of one of those cards if its mana value is less than the number of cards types among cards exiled this way. (Copies become tokens.)

card.name: Scarlet Moon
card.text: As Scarlet Moon enters, each player chooses a different color. Nonbasic lands are lands with "{T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors," and lose all other abilities, card types, and land types."

card.name: Unifier of Flesh and Purpose
card.text: Flying You can't cast creature spells that aren't named Baneslayer Angel. You may cast creature spells as copies of Baneslayer Angel. (It's a {3}{W}{W} Angel creature with flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons.)

card.name: Blinking Horizon
card.text: Betrayal {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacker: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking, then draw a card.) Flash Flying When Blinking Horizon enters, you may have target nonland permanent or spells' owner put it into its owner's library third from the top.

card.name: Endless Investigation
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, investigate, then put a 2/2 blue Detective creature counter on each Clue you control. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card." The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Collapse in Silence
card.text: Exile all creatures and put a void counter on each of them. {X}{B}, Pay X life, Exile Collapse in Silence from your graveyard: You may cast a card exiled with a void counter on it with mana value X without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Kindly Guide of Souls
card.text: Flash Flying When Kindly Guide of Souls enters, until end of turn, whenever a nontoken creature you control dies this turn, put a creature counter that's a copy of that creature on Kindly Guide of Souls. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.)

card.name: Overwhelming Vitality
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Overwhelming Vitality deals 5 damage to target player and 5 damage to up to one target permanent that player controls.

card.name: Rise of the Primordials
card.text: If a counter would become a creature under your control, it instead becomes a 5/5 Horror creature with trample. Whenever a permanent you control with counters leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each noncreature counter on it.

card.name: Nursery of Skin
card.text: Trample You may have other creatures you control enter as 4/4 Horror creatures with no abilities.

card.name: Frankie Lorre, Underboss
card.text: Frankie Lorre enters with a Frankie's Pet creature counter on him. (The counter becomes a 5/5 legendary black Spider creature with deathtouch and reach when this permanent leaves.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a Spider, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return Frankie Lorre from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rescue the Damned
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Rescue the Damned enters or is defeated, choose one — • Search your library for an Angel or Ameret card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • You may put an Angel or Ameret card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Messa di Requiem per Ctonia
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Messa di Requiem per Ctonia enters or is defeated, each player exiles the top half of their library, rounded up. You gain 1 life for each card type among cards exiled this way.

card.name: Tangled in Crimson
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) Whenever you discard one or more cards, Tangled in Crimson deals that much damage to itself, then exile those cards. When Tangled in Crimson is defeated, you may play any number of cards exiled by it until your next end step. (You still pay their costs.)

card.name: Compounded Realities
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) When Compounded Realities is defeated, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Claim of the Aberrant
card.text: (As a Heist enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you can attack it. When it is defeated, create a Bounty, an artifact token that gives your creatures +1/+1.) Whenever Claim of the Aberrant enters or is defeated, until your next turn's end step, whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: Tome of Retained Flesh
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if Tome of Retained Flesh doesn't have any creature counters on it, put a creature counter that's a copy of that creature on Tome of Retained Flesh. {2}, {T}, Remove a creature counter from Tome of Retained Flesh: Create a token that's a copy of the removed creature counter.

card.name: Abbatar, the Whole of Unity
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {1}. You may cast Abbatar from your graveyard by discarding two cards as an additional cost to cast it.

card.name: Zim-Shirrem, Threads of Life
card.text: Menace Whenever Zim-Shirrem, Threads of Life attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw two cards. You may cast Zim-Shirrem from your graveyard by discarding two cards in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Unattended Mausoleum
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If you exile a creature card from your graveyard this way, put a creature counter that's a copy of that creature on this land. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) {2}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a copy of a creature counter on it.

card.name: Composite Colossus
card.text: Composite Colossus enters with a 3/3 Bird Construct creature counter with flying, a 3/3 Construct creature counter with lifelink, and a 3/3 Cat Construct creature counter with deathtouch. (The counter becomes a creature token when the permanent it is on leaves.) Composite Colossus has all abilities of creature counters on it.

card.name: Unbidden Rabota
card.text: Unbidden Rabota can't be blocked by creatures with mana value 3 or greater. As long as Unbidden Rabota is attacking alone, creature cards in your hand have betrayal. The betrayal cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}.

card.name: Clue ORC
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.

card.name: Construct ORC
card.text: Deathtouch

card.name: Treasure ORC
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Bounty ORC
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Spirit ORC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Construct ORC
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Construct ORC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Insect Horror ORC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Copy ORC
card.text: (This token can be used to represent a token that's a copy of a permanent.)

card.name: Dragon ORC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Mr. Monroe, Exquisite Collector
card.text: When Mr. Monroe enters, create The Collection, a legendary colorless artifact token with "Note the name of each spell you cast." Mr. Monroe gets +1/+0 for each different name noted on The Collection that you control. If there are five or more names noted, he has double strike.

card.name: Frankie's Pet ORC
card.text: Deathtouch, reach

card.name: The Mabuse Trio
card.text: Flying, menace, deathtouch When The Mabuse Trio enters, defending player sacrifices a nonland permanent. Whenever The Mabuse Trio attacks, defending player loses 3 life. When The Mabuse Trio dies, return target nonland nonlegendary permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

prop.type: Legendary Creature — Bird Snake Crocodile Warrior

card.name: Tamsin and Riggs of the Fox Agency
card.text: Whenever Tamsin and Riggs of the Fox Agency enters or attacks, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Nonland cards in your hand have "You may cast this card by sacrificing X Clues you control rather than pay this card's mana cost, where X is this card's mana value."

set.picurl: https://DNAZangy.github.io/sets/ORC-files/img/247_Tamsin and Riggs of the Fox Agency.png

card.name: Spectrum of the Multiverse
card.text: The first white spell you cast each turn costs {W} less to cast. The same is true for the first blue spell and {U}, the first black spell and {B}, the first red spell and {R}, and the first green spell and {G}. Whenever you cast a spell, if the amount of mana spent to cast that spell was less than its mana value, draw a card.

card.name: Tongue of Tethaleeg
card.text: Creatures attacking or dying don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Sinking Lot
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land. Each player creates a tapped colorless basic land token named Wastes with "{T}: Add {C}."

card.name: Wastes ORC
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Cat ORC
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Horror ORC
card.text: Trample

card.name: Collections Box ORC
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Cawyer River Dockworkers
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control and each counter on permanents you control. Whenever another permanent you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on Cawyer River Dockworkers. (Creature counters will still become creatures and you put a copy of that counter on this creature.)

card.name: Dapper Detective
card.text: Flash When Dapper Detective enters, counter target activated or triggered ability from a nonland source. If an ability of a permanent is countered this way, you may return that permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Moroii Cleaner
card.text: Deathtouch, haste At the beginning of your end step, each opponent without any cards in hand loses 2 life. Put a number of 1/1 black Shade creature counters on Moroii Cleaner equal to the amount of life lost this way. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.)

card.name: Zhang Seductress
card.text: Menace Other Rogues you control have menace. {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 red Rogue creature token.

card.name: Shambling Nest
card.text: Shambling Nest enters with two 1/1 green Insect creature counters on it. (The counters become creature tokens when the permanent they're on leaves the battlefield.) Shambling Nest can't attack or block as long as it has a counter on it. {1}{G}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Surveil 2, and you gain 3 life.
